  "text": "from PIL import Image\nimport numpy as np\nimport matplotlib.pyplot as plt\nimport scipy.signal as signal\nimport soundfile as sf\n\n# Load the image and convert to grayscale\nimage_path = \"/mnt/data/A_digital_artwork_in_the_abstract_genre_features_f.png\"\nimg = Image.open(image_path).convert(\"L\")\nimg_array = np.array(img)\n\n# Take the middle horizontal slice of the image\nmiddle_row = img_array[img_array.shape[0] // 2]\n\n# Normalize the pixel values to [-1, 1] for audio signal\nwaveform = (middle_row - 128) / 128.0\n\n# Resample to a desired sample rate and duration\ntarget_duration = 5.0  # seconds\nsample_rate = 44100  # Hz\nnum_samples = int(sample_rate * target_duration)\nresampled_waveform = signal.resample(waveform, num_samples)\n\n# Save as WAV file\noutput_audio_path = \"/mnt/data/binoche_visual_to_audio.wav\"\nsf.write(output_audio_path, resampled_waveform, sample_rate)\n\noutput_audio_path"

  "text": "import numpy as np\nimport matplotlib.pyplot as plt\nimport soundfile as sf\n\n# Define the musical interpretation of the poem with a slow ambient tone\n# We'll simulate a melody using sine waves for each line\n\nsample_rate = 44100  # 44.1 kHz sample rate\nduration_per_line = 3  # seconds per line\nfrequencies = [220, 246, 196, 174, 261, 220, 196]  # Approximate emotional tones\n\n# Create the waveform\nwaveform = np.array([], dtype=np.float32)\n\nfor freq in frequencies:\n    t = np.linspace(0, duration_per_line, int(sample_rate * duration_per_line), False)\n    tone = 0.5 * np.sin(2 * np.pi * freq * t) * np.exp(-2 * t)  # soft fading tone\n    waveform = np.concatenate((waveform, tone))\n\n# Normalize to prevent clipping\nwaveform = waveform / np.max(np.abs(waveform))\n\n# Save the audio\noutput_path = \"/mnt/data/binoche_poem_melody.wav\"\nsf.write(output_path, waveform, sample_rate)\n\noutput_path"

  "text": "import numpy as np\nimport scipy.io.wavfile as wavfile\nfrom pydub import AudioSegment\nfrom pydub.generators import Sine\n\n# Parameters for ambient sound generation\nduration = 100  # seconds\nsample_rate = 44100\nvolume = -20  # in dBFS\n\n# Create a low drone tone (fundamental)\ndrone = Sine(130).to_audio_segment(duration=duration * 1000).apply_gain(volume)\n\n# Overlay subtle high harmonics\nharmonics = Sine(260).to_audio_segment(duration=duration * 1000).apply_gain(volume - 5)\ntexture = Sine(390).to_audio_segment(duration=duration * 1000).apply_gain(volume - 10)\n\n# Subtle noise layer to simulate airy texture\nnoise = AudioSegment.silent(duration=duration * 1000)\nfor freq in [220, 440, 880]:\n    noise = noise.overlay(Sine(freq).to_audio_segment(duration=duration * 1000).apply_gain(volume - 15))\n\n# Combine layers\nambient_bgm = drone.overlay(harmonics).overlay(texture).overlay(noise)\n\n# Fade in/out for smooth entry/exit\nambient_bgm = ambient_bgm.fade_in(3000).fade_out(4000)\n\n# Export final ambient track\noutput_path = \"/mnt/data/Lua_BinochAmbient_FirstField.wav\"\nambient_bgm.export(output_path, format=\"wav\")\n\noutput_path"
